com.github.sanity4j.workflow

Class QAProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.workflow.QAProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class QAProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    QAProcessor handles the various tasks that need to be performed in the QA process.
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
